name: The Coroner Saga: Complete Season 1
detailed_description:
Become a Coroner
Sara is a young doctor who just completed Med School with the highest degrees. Uncertain about her future she joins the Coroners' State Institute and the adventure begins!

Every Episode in Season 1
Each season is made of 6 episodes and each episode's duration is about 3-4 hours in gameplay.
This DLC package includes every episode of season 1. By buying the package you save on the price of the single episode, earning two for free (buying the first episode is still needed as it contains the base game).

Episodes and their release

EPISODE 1: The Debbie Downer *** AVAILABLE NOW ***
EPISODE 2: The Body Don't Lie - October 31st, 2019
EPISODE 3: Bathtub Baby - To be announced
EPISODE 4: Deadly Truth- To be announced
EPISODE 5: Perfect Storm - To be announced
EPISODE 6: Sugar Rush - To be announced

short_description: Grab The Coroner Saga full Season 1 with all 6 episodes included and get 2 for free! Episodes will be released every 3-4 months.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual situations, sexual intercourse, alcohol abuse, medical-related nudity. All of these can be set off with an in-game option.
